1.title: Curriculum Vitae
1.content: You can download my cv here. If you are not able to see the preview of the CV, please download the it using the link above.

3.title: Welcome!
3.content: . My name is Giacomo Manferdini and since September 2020 I am a Predoctoral Research Associate at the University of Bonn. I am based at the Institue for Applied Microeconomics and I am working with Lorenz Goette and Egon Tripodi. Previosuly, I obtained my M.Sc. in Economics in 2020 and my B.Sc. in Economics and Finance in 2018, both from the University of Bologna. My research interests lie in labor, political, behavioral, and public economics. In September 2021, I will joing the PhD in Economics at Bocconi University.
